Notes: The Black Flame Shotgun is bound to the Witch's Brew quest. It scales with your level, but disappears after the quest is turned in.

Elements: None / Fire / Shock / Corrosive / Cryo / Radiation

Notes: The Brashi's Dedication Sniper Rifle is only rewarded when you complete the optional objective by collecting all 4 memory fragments.
The Buttplug Pistol is only rewarded when you complete the optional objective by shooting The Holy Dumptruck in the ass. After the target is killed you can jump down to open a Red Chest.
Open door for Ramsden for shotgun or side with Holder for a Shield

Elements: None / Fire / Shock / Corrosive / Cryo / Radiation

Notes: After you found most of the Crimson Radio Towers, Moxxi sends you mail with the Vibra Pulse SMG.
Reloading the Game or traveling to a different map resets the counter. This allows you to receive multiple Kaleidoscopes.
The Rogue Sight Pistol is bound to the Going Rogue quest. It scales with your level, but disappears after the quest is turned in.
The Seventh Sense Pistol is bound to the Cold Case: Restless Memories quest. It scales with your level, but disappears after the quest is turned in.
Luring out Bella with electric meat will reward The Beast with Shock luring her out with radioactive meat will reward The Best with Radiation.
